name: Deck Quest: Jam Edition
description:
Deck Quest: Jam Edition

Welcome to Deck Quest, a card-based, strategy rpg, with roguelite elements.
Recruit and build up your party of heroes and travel the Land, to get rid of the evil that is lurking in the far of lands.


Choose your Path!

Decide on where to go next. Do you want to rest at a campfire to recover the health of your heroes? want to open a treasure chest? Or do you want to hire a new hero in a bar? The Choice is up to you, aslong as you don't run out of cards.

Running out of Cards?

Don't worry, you can always buy new cards from the gacha machine in the card menu. Given you carry the necessary amount of coins with you.

Time to Upgrade!

Collect experience points from defeated enemies, to level up and increase yours stats, like health, damage, defense or even learn new skills.

And defeat strong Bosses!

At the end of each world, a strong boss awaits you. Travel enough and you might be able to defeat them and get to the next area!
